page.title: 04GAMES CHILDREN PLAY
page.content: Many games are played in the playground of our school at Drumoak and in the street or park after school. Old favourites like "Hide and Seek", "Tig and Tag", "Rounders" and "Skipping".Here are two popular games which are part of our recreation. Kerbie: Two people stand on the kerb facing each other. One takes a ball and tries to hit the opposite kerb. If this is done he gets another turn,butif he fails his opponent then tries. Kiss,Cuddle and Torture is played by boys and girls. When the girls are in the "dell" they count up to ten and the boys run away, the girls then try to catch them. When caught, the girls say 'Kiss,cuddle or torture" and the boys have to give out the punishment. The team then changes and the girls run away.
